original_text: When the sea poured out of the ground, I decided where its borders should be. I kept the water in its right place. When the sea poured out of the ground,
korean_text: 바다가 그 모태에서 터져 나올 때에 문으로 그것을 가둔 자가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: When the sea poured out of the ground
I decided where its borders should be
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 경계가 어디에 있어야 하는지 정했다

sentences.original_text: I kept the water in its right place
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 물을 올바른 곳에 머물게 했다
